name: Jonh's Nights
description:
Warning: This game a serious-joke game. Meaning that it isn't intended to be anything big, or have "any" lore, at least not as of current.

Your name is Jacc. One day while walking through the forest, you fall down a whole and decide to wait there until you finally realize that you want to leave.
That's the Story.

FEATURES:

4 Main Nights (becuase: originality).
A Custom Night.
3 'Endings'.
4 Characters.
Yeah.

FNaF is owned by Scott Cawthon.
